competitors.name: Microsoft
competitors.notes: Dynamics 365, Azure, SQL Server, Power BI (36% BI market share)

competitors.name: Amazon (AWS)
competitors.notes: 32% cloud market share, 9 years before Oracle Cloud

competitors.name: SAP
competitors.notes: ERP leader with S/4HANA and HANA database

competitors.name: Salesforce
competitors.notes: CRM leader with 21.9% share vs Oracle's 5%

context: Oracle entered cloud market with OCI in 2015, 9 years after AWS. Microsoft Power BI dominated BI with 36% share. AWS at 32% cloud share.
